title: Oscar De La Hoya Interview and More
itunes:title: Oscar De La Hoya Interview and More
description:
Today on the show we had promoter and former boxer Oscar De La Hoya come by where he spoke about how the Mayweather and McGregor fight was disrespectful to boxing , dressing in fishnets and more. Also Charlamagne gave “Doneky of the Day” to Christopher ‘Kid’ Reid from the legendary group “Kid n’ Play” because he sided with Jason Whitlock and imitated Colin Kaepernick’s movement on the social injustice. Moreover, Angela helped some listeners out during “Ask Yee”.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we had promoter and former boxer Oscar De La Hoya come by where he spoke about how the Mayweather and McGregor fight was disrespectful to boxing , dressing in fishnets and more. Also Charlamagne gave “Doneky of the Day” to Christopher ‘Kid’ Reid from the legendary group “Kid n’ Play” because he sided with Jason Whitlock and imitated Colin Kaepernick’s movement on the social injustice. Moreover, Angela helped some listeners out during “Ask Yee”.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
